decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | The use permitted shall not operate outside 8.00 to 18.00 hours Mondays to Fridays and shall not be carried out at any time on Saturdays, Sundays or Public Holidays.  REASON:	In the interests of the living conditions of occupiers of nearby properties. | The use granted shall be personal to David Thompson on behalf Mark One only and shall not enure for the benefit of the land, or any other person or company without the prior written permission of the Local Planning Authority.  If after the development has been carried out David Thompson on behalf of Mark One ceases to be the occupier of the land the use shall be discontinued.  REASON: In granting this permission the Local Planning Authority has had regard to the special circumstances of the applicant and considers that the use otherwise than by David Thompson would have resulted in permission being refused. | No more than 12 children shall occupy the premises at any one time and there shall be no variation without the prior written approval of the Local Planning Authority.  REASON:  To safeguard the amenities of the neighbouring properties.
description: Change of use of part of ground floor from warehouse to day nursery (with two offices downstairs)
